mapper.select: select s.id as id, s.name as name, room_id, faculty_id, s.number as number, registration_date, phone, photo, is_leave, r.id as r_id, r.number as r_number, f.id as f_id, f.name as f_name from student s left join room r on s.room_id = r.id left join faculty f on s.faculty_id = f.id where s.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into student(name, room_id, faculty_id, number, registration_date, phone, photo, is_leave, is_delete) VALUE (#{name}, #{roomId}, #{facultyId}, #{number}, now(), #{phone}, #{photo}, 0, 0)
mapper.update: update student set is_delete = 1, room_id = null where id = #{id}

update student
name = #{name},
faculty_id = #{facultyId},
`number`=#{number},
phone = #{phone},
room_id = #{roomId}
where id =#{id}

SELECT s.id as id, s.name as name, r.number as r_number, f.name as f_name FROM `student` as s LEFT JOIN room as r On s.room_id = r.id LEFT JOIN faculty as f ON s.faculty_id = f.id;

SELECT f_college.name AS f_name, COUNT(DISTINCT s.id) AS count FROM student s -- 连接班级表 JOIN faculty f_class ON s.faculty_id = f_class.id -- 连接专业表 JOIN faculty f_major ON f_class.parent_id = f_major.id -- 连接学院表 JOIN faculty f_college ON f_major.parent_id = f_college.id -- 连接学校表（验证层级） JOIN faculty f_school ON f_college.parent_id = f_school.id WHERE is_delete = 0 GROUP BY f_college.name;
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(registration_date, '%Y-%m') AS registration_month, COUNT(*) AS count FROM student WHERE is_delete = 0 GROUP BY registration_date ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
